text: "Mamma Mia" is a song by the Swedish pop group ABBA. The song comes off the group's third studio album ABBA. The song was released in September 1975. In Australia, Germany, Ireland and Switzerland, the song hit #1. In 1999, the A-Teens covered "Mamma Mia". It was later covered in 2008 by the actress Meryl Streep. ==References== Category:Pop songs Category:ABBA songs Category:1975 songs
title: Mamma Mia (ABBA song)
